1.SceneDescription:
Central Perk, everyone except Phoebe is there. Bonnie is telling them of her
sex-capades.

lines.Line: (to Bonnie) So ah, your first sexual experience was with a woman?

All right, I was 15, it was my best friend, Ruth, and we got drunk on
that hard cider, and then suddenly, I don’t know, we were, we were making out
Tell it again. (pause, we see Rachel is not amused.) Seriously

lines.Character: [cut to Rachel and Monica at the counter
lines.Line: cut to Rachel and Monica at the counter.

lines.Character: [cut to Rachel and Monica at the counter
lines.Line: cut to Rachel and Monica at the counter.

(to Monica) I mean is that woman capable of talking about anything else
but sex
Yeah, sure. Well y'know, earlier she was talking about geography
Joey, she was listing the countries she’s done it in
Joey, she was listing the countries she’s done it in
Well, I think we all learned something

(entering, hurridly) Hey, you guys! Look what I found! Look at this!
(She hands Chandler a picture) That’s my Mom’s writing! Look

(reading the back of the picture) Me and Frank and Phoebe, Graduation
1965

No-no, that’s not, that’s not me Phoebe, that’s
her pal Phoebe. According to her high school yearbook, they were like B.F.F. (Ross and
Bonnie look at her quizzically) Best Friends Forever

I know! So this woman probably could like have all kinds of stories
about my parents, and she might even know like where my Dad is. So I looked her up, and
she lives out by the beach. So maybe this weekend we could go to the beach
(to Ross) Shoot! I can’t go, I have to work
So great! Okay! Tomorrow we’re gonna drive out to Montauk

2.SceneDescription:
At the Beach, it’s raining cats and dogs as the gang arrives. Chandler and
Monica are taking shelter under Rachel’s hat.

lines.Line: Oh yeah, now everybody wants to be under this hat

lines.Character: (They get inside and notice on small problem
lines.Line: They get inside and notice on small problem.

lines.Character: (They get inside and notice on small problem
lines.Line: They get inside and notice on small problem.

What’s with all this sand? (picking a handful of sand off of the
floor, which is covered in sand
Oh, yeah, Bob said there might be flood damage
Yeah, either that, or he has a really big cat
Yeah, either that, or he has a really big cat

3.SceneDescription:
The beach house, it’s still raining. Chandler is building a sand castle,
Rachel is doing Monica’s nails, and they’re all drinking margaritas, obviously
bored.

lines.Line: (getting an idea) Hey, y'know what a really good rainy day game is
I mean naked game. Strip poker, we should totally play strip poker
Come on! When you go away, you-you have to play, it’s like a law

Okay, who’s next?! (She looks around the room, and stops when she
comes to Ross.
No-o-o! (Rachel gives him a “Please?” look.) No way!
Come on, please?! I’m boredddd! You let me do it once before

lines.Character:
(Ross shoots Joey a look, who shoots Chandler a look, who gives Joey an “Oh my
God.” look back
lines.Line:
Ross shoots Joey a look, who shoots Chandler a look, who gives Joey an “Oh my
God.” look back.

Yeah well, if ah, if that’s the rule this weekend... (She gets up)
No

Yeah well, if ah, if that’s the rule this weekend... (She gets up)
No
Yes! (she starts creeping up on him
Take it like a man, Ross
Take it like a man, Ross

(he gets up and starts to run away from her) No! (in his escape attempt he
crushes Chandler’s sand castle) No

lines.Character: (Ross dives over the couch, Rachel goes the other way, and lands up top of him
lines.Line: Ross dives over the couch, Rachel goes the other way, and lands up top of him.

lines.Character:
(They get into a wrestling match, that ends with Ross making Rachel paint her forehead
with the nail polish. They both end up lying next to each other, stop, and look at each
other for a moment
lines.Line:
They get into a wrestling match, that ends with Ross making Rachel paint her forehead
with the nail polish. They both end up lying next to each other, stop, and look at each
other for a moment.
Oh, so, how are we doing
Hey, you know what naked card game is never boring
I’m kind, caring, and sweet. What’s Monica like
Ah no, the other Phoebe, the one you went to go see
Ah no, the other Phoebe, the one you went to go see
Ohh, I think she knows where my Dad is

She was acting, she was pretending like she hasn’t heard from him
on years, but I found this picture on her fridge, and look (shows Monica)! Isn’t this
what he would look like now
(gasps) Totally familiar. (Phoebe shows the rest of them.
(gasps) Totally familiar. (Phoebe shows the rest of them.
Well, why would she lie to you

I don’t know, but we’re having dinner tomorrow night, so I
figured, she’s gonna tell me then. Y'know maybe she just wanted to give him time to,
buy me presents, I don’t know! So, you’re all bored

All right, I’m gonna close my eyes and point to someone, and you,
whoever I point has to come up with something fun for us to do, and we have to do
it.

lines.Character:
(They do so, and Phoebe gets in the middle, closes her eyes, and starts spinning in a
circle
lines.Line:
They do so, and Phoebe gets in the middle, closes her eyes, and starts spinning in a
circle.

Okay. (Starts to spin) Ooh, y'know we could just do this. (She stops at
Chandler
Okay, umm, we all have to play strip poker

Yeah, well, I couldn’t find any cards, so it was either this or Strip
Bag Of Old Knitting Stuff
Monica rolls, and Ross goes first.
Monica rolls, and Ross goes first.

Okay, (reading the card) Fonzy gives you two thumbs up, collect two cool
points. Yeah

Monica, if you get five cool points, you get to make somebody take off
one item of clothing. It hasn’t happened yet, but we’re all very excited

Okay, come on! (blows on the dice) Daddy needs a new pair of
electromagnetic microscopes for the Prehistoric Forensics Department! (They all look at
him, and he shuts up and rolls the dice.) (he moves his piece) Okay. (reading a card) Take
Pinky Tuscadero up to Inspiration Point, collect three cool points!! Yeah! Which gives me
five, and let’s see who is gonna lose their clothes. Ummmm, I think I pick our strip
poker sponsor Mr. Joey Tribianni
All right, relax. It’s just a shoe
cut to later in the game

(reading a card) Okay, your band is playing at Arnold’s, collect
three cool points. Which means, I have five, and that means I get Joey’s boxers
Fine. Gang up on me! I got you all right where I want you

Actually, y'know it’s kinda cold, so how about I keep my boxers on,
and give you all a peek at the good stuff

(getting up) All right, I’m gonna make more margaritas! (She pours
the rest of the pitcher into Ross’s glass.
Whoa, hey! What are doing? Trying to get me drunk
Whoa, hey! What are doing? Trying to get me drunk

I think I’ll help her out. (She gets up to go over and help Rachel,
and reveals she has no pants.) (to Rachel) What is going on here
Chasing him all around the room
He’s totally flirting with you too

(pause) He is, isn’t he? I don’t know, I don’t know, I
mean maybe it’s just being here at the beach together or, I don’t know. But
it’s like something... (she’s interrupted by the sound of Bonnie entering
Hi! My boss let me off early, so I took the train.
We’re playing Strip Happy Days Game
We’re playing Strip Happy Days Game
Cool! I’ll catch up! (She takes off her sweater.

4.SceneDescription: The porch, Bonnie is coming back from swimming, Rachel is reading.

lines.Line: Oh, ah nothin’. I just felt like hangin’ out here and reading

Oh, the water was sooo great! We jumped off this pier and my suit came
off
Yeah, Joey and Chandler sure are funny.
Yeah, Joey and Chandler sure are funny.

I think I brought back half of the beach in my hair. It was so much
easier when I used to shave my head

Y'know, I gotta tell ya, I just loved your look when you were
bald
Because I think about shaving it all off again sometime
I mean you definitely should do that
Y'know what, I should do it
Y'know what, I should do it
Yeah, thank you Rachel, you are soo cool
Awww, stop. Come on. Now go shave that head

lines.Character:
(As Bonnie goes to do just that, Rachel smiles to herself, proud of what she’s
done
lines.Line:
As Bonnie goes to do just that, Rachel smiles to herself, proud of what she’s
done.

5.SceneDescription: Outside the beach house, Ross is coming out to talk to Rachel.

lines.Line:
I was having a little chat with ah, Bonnie, and ah, guess what, she-she
happened to bring up y'know, who was behind the um, whole head shaving idea, and now, who
was it? Oh, that’s right, that’s right, it was you
That was her idea, I just gave her a nudge
She said you gave her the razor
She said you gave her the razor
So, anyone up for a midnight dip in the ocean
Okay, I’ll see you in a bit
Okay, I’ll see you in a bit
Come on see, she doesn’t look that bad

You can see the moonlight bouncing off her head! What the hell were you
thinking?!
You don’t know?! Rach, you balded my girlfriend

All right! Ross, do you think it’s easy for me to see you with
somebody else
Y'know, hey! You’re the one who ended it, remember
Y'know, hey! You’re the one who ended it, remember
Yeah, because I was mad at you, not because I stopped loving you
Oh, y-yeah, so, you-you love me
Oh, y-yeah, so, you-you love me

Noo, nnnnn. What does this mean? What do you, I mean do you wanna, get
back together

Noo! Maybe! I, I don’t know. Ross, I still can’t forgive you
for what you did, I can’t, I just, but sometimes when I’m with you I just, I
feel so..
I just, I feel, I-I just..

lines.Character:
(Ross leans in and kisses her. They both look at each other for a moment, and then
embrace in a more passionate kiss, only to be interrupted by Joey and Chandler coming
outside
lines.Line:
Ross leans in and kisses her. They both look at each other for a moment, and then
embrace in a more passionate kiss, only to be interrupted by Joey and Chandler coming
outside.

(to Joey) Noo!! I don’t care! I’m not, I’m not gonna
playing one-on-one strip poker with you for practice!

lines.Character: (Rachel and Ross both stop kissing, and quickly step back from each other
lines.Line: Rachel and Ross both stop kissing, and quickly step back from each other.
Well! Good night. (to Ross) I’m going upstairs

lines.Character:
(Rachel walks inside, stops, and turns back to look at Ross for a moment then goes
upstairs
lines.Line:
Rachel walks inside, stops, and turns back to look at Ross for a moment then goes
upstairs.
(to Ross) Wanna play strip poker for practice

6.SceneDescription:
Outside the beach house, Ross is telling Joey and Chandler what happened with
Rachel.

lines.Line: I’m telling ya, you guys are totally getting back together

That’s not true! Her, she doesn’t even know what she wants!
Rachel’s still mad about the whole thing

Okay, then you gotta back away, all right? You don’t need that
kind’ve hurt. Take it from a guy who’s never had a long term relationship.....
I know, but ahhhhhh!! I really wanna go up there and finish that kiss
You guys, the water’s great. You should really go in
Oh, ahh, no thanks, I just had an M&M
Oh, ahh, no thanks, I just had an M&M
There is not one hair on that head

Hey, it’ll grow back, right? And she-she’s really fun, and
she’s cool, and-and I’m finally moving on. Y'know? I mean getting over Rachel
was so (makes an incoherent nasal sound), y'know? Y'know, and I’m finally feeling
sane again. And now if I go up there, and-and I kiss her, and, Gooood I wanna kiss her,
and-and-and it doesn’t work out, right? Do I really wanna put myself through that
again

So let me get this straight. If you go with Bonnie tonight, you’re
doing the smart, healthy thing and moving on
Right, and you go with Rachel, Bonnie’s free tonight

7.SceneDescription:
The beach house, Chandler is simulating he’s coming to pick up Monica for
a date. Chandler knocks on the door, and Monica answers it.

lines.Line:
Okay! Okay! Let me try it again, you’re gonna wanna date this
next guy, I swear

lines.Character:
(Monica closes the door, Chandler knocks, and Monica opens it to reveal Chandler on his
knees
lines.Line:
Monica closes the door, Chandler knocks, and Monica opens it to reveal Chandler on his
knees.

Hi! I’m Dorf! You’re date for the evening. (Monica walks
away in disgust) Oh come on! Dorf on dating, that’s good stuff!
